Description: Tonal 10 digital mode with focus on sensitivity, band capacity and resistance to the HF Doppler frequency spread
C4FM 4-level FSK Technology Imported QSOs with <MODE:4>C4FM> must be exported as: <MODE:12>DIGITALVOICE <SUBMODE:4>C4FM
Digital Smart Technologies for Amateur Radio Imported QSOs with <MODE:5>DSTAR must be exported as: <MODE:12>DIGITALVOICE <SUBMODE:5>DSTAR
